title: Create A Discussion Issues
body: Every time I click on the "Create A Discussion" it says I must be level 6 or higher. I'm currently level 9 in game.

replies.body: Indeed, it can be a bit for your account to sync up to the boards when posting for the first time.  Glad to hear all is well now!

Hello Complete,

Since you have posted that, are you able to post something now? I would assume you can since you posted this but lets make sure.
It's fixed now. Thanks for the reply!
